body:
UPDATE KM SET KM.IsITUpdate = KM.IsITUpdate, KM.ResimFileStreamID = KonfModel.stream_id
FROM dbo.IT22_KonfModel KM
INNER JOIN (
				 SELECT DISTINCT S.KonfModelID, FKP.stream_id
			FROM dbo.IT06_Stoklar_Konf_Paket SKP
			INNER JOIN IT06_Stoklar S ON S.UrunTID = SKP.UrunTID
			INNER JOIN (SELECT KP.stream_id, /*TRY_CONVERT(INT, REPLACE(KP.name, '.'+ KP.file_type , '') */REPLACE(KP.name, '.'+ KP.file_type , '') UrunSiraNo
			 FROM dbo.FT06_KonfPaketUrunDosyalari KP) FKP ON FKP.UrunSiraNo = SKP.UrunSiraNoChr) KonfModel ON KonfModel.KonfModelID = KM.KonfModelID




			  SELECT DISTINCT S.KonfModelID, FKP.stream_id
			FROM dbo.IT06_Stoklar_Konf_Paket SKP
			INNER JOIN IT06_Stoklar S ON S.UrunTID = SKP.UrunTID
			Inner JOIN IT22_KonfModel KM On KM.KonfModelID = S.KonfModelID
			INNER JOIN (SELECT KP.stream_id, /*TRY_CONVERT(INT, REPLACE(KP.name, '.'+ KP.file_type , '') */REPLACE(KP.name, '.'+ KP.file_type , '') UrunSiraNo
			 FROM dbo.FT06_KonfPaketUrunDosyalari KP) FKP ON FKP.UrunSiraNo = SKP.UrunSiraNoChr
			 Where KM.ModelTanimNo = '23974'

			 SELECT SKP.* FROM IT06_Stoklar_Konf_Paket SKP
			 INNER JOIN IT06_Stoklar S On S.UrunTID = SKP.UrunTID
			 INNER JOIN IT22_KonfModel KM On KM.KonfModelID = S.KonfModelID
			 Where KM.ModelTanimNo In ('23974','23975','23976','23977','23978','23979','23980','23981','24137') And SKP.UrunSiraNoChr Is not null
